<h2>ğŸ“‹ ç›®å½•</h2>

<h2>Heartbeat æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆ</h2>
<p><strong>Heartbeatï¼ˆå¿ƒè·³ï¼‰</strong> æ˜¯ OpenClaw çš„å®šæœŸè§¦å‘æœºåˆ¶ï¼Œè®© AI Agent ä¸»åŠ¨æ£€æŸ¥åå°ä»»åŠ¡å¹¶æ±‡æŠ¥ã€‚</p>
<p><strong>å·¥ä½œåŸç†ï¼š</strong></p>
<pre><code>æ¯ 30 åˆ†é’Ÿ (å¯é…ç½®)
    â†“
Gateway è§¦å‘å¿ƒè·³
    â†“
Agent è¯»å– HEARTBEAT.md (å¦‚æœå­˜åœ¨)
    â†“
Agent æ‰§è¡Œå¿ƒè·³ä»»åŠ¡ (æ£€æŸ¥é‚®ç®±ã€æ—¥å†ã€å¾…åŠç­‰)
    â†“
å¦‚æœæœ‰éœ€è¦å…³æ³¨çš„ â†’ å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯ç»™ç”¨æˆ·
å¦‚æœä¸€åˆ‡æ­£å¸¸ â†’ å›å¤ HEARTBEAT_OK (è‡ªåŠ¨ä¸¢å¼ƒï¼Œä¸å‘é€)
</code></pre>
<p><strong>ç‰¹ç‚¹ï¼š</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>âœ… æœ‰äº‹æ±‡æŠ¥ï¼Œæ²¡äº‹æ²‰é»˜</li>
<li>âœ… é¿å…æ‰“æ‰°ç”¨æˆ·</li>
<li>âœ… ä¿æŒåå°ä»»åŠ¡ç›‘æ§</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>é…ç½®æ–¹å¼</h2>
<h3>æ–¹å¼ 1ï¼šå…¨å±€é…ç½®ï¼ˆæ‰€æœ‰ agentï¼‰</h3>
<pre><code class="language-json5">// ~/.openclaw/openclaw.json
{
  "agents": {
    "defaults": {
      "heartbeat": {
        "every": "30m",
        "target": "none",
        "directPolicy": "allow"
      }
    }
  }
}
</code></pre>
<h3>æ–¹å¼ 2ï¼šé’ˆå¯¹ç‰¹å®š agent é…ç½®</h3>
<pre><code class="language-json5">{
  "agents": {
    "list": [
      { "id": "main" },  // ä¸é…ç½® heartbeatï¼Œä¸è¿è¡Œå¿ƒè·³
      {
        "id": "claw-admin",
        "heartbeat": {
          "every": "30m",
          "target": "none",
          "directPolicy": "allow"
        }
      }  // è¿è¡Œå¿ƒè·³
    ]
  }
}
</code></pre>
<p><strong>æ³¨æ„ï¼š</strong> å¦‚æœä»»ä½• <code>agents.list[]</code> åŒ…å« <code>heartbeat</code> å—ï¼Œ<strong>åªæœ‰è¿™äº› agent</strong> ä¼šè¿è¡Œå¿ƒè·³ã€‚</p>

<h2>é…ç½®å­—æ®µè¯´æ˜</h2>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>å­—æ®µ</th>
<th>é»˜è®¤å€¼</th>

</tr>

<tbody>
<tr>
<td><code>every</code></td>
<td><code>"30m"</code></td>
<td>å¿ƒè·³é—´éš”ï¼Œ<code>"0m"</code> ç¦ç”¨</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>target</code></td>
<td><code>"none"</code></td>
<td><code>"none"</code> (ä¸å‘é€) | <code>"last"</code> (æœ€åè”ç³»äºº) | é¢‘é“ ID</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>directPolicy</code></td>
<td><code>"allow"</code></td>
<td><code>"allow"</code> å…è®¸ DM | <code>"block"</code> ç¦æ­¢ DM</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>prompt</code></td>
<td>(é»˜è®¤)</td>
<td>è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¿ƒè·³æç¤ºè¯</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><code>activeHours</code></td>
<td>(æ— )</td>
<td>æ´»åŠ¨æ—¶é—´çª—å£ <code>{start: "09:00", end: "22:00"}</code></td>
</tr>
<tr>

<td><code>false</code></td>
<td>æ˜¯å¦å‘é€æ¨ç†è¿‡ç¨‹</td>
</tr>

<h2>HEARTBEAT.md æ–‡ä»¶</h2>
<h3>ä½ç½®</h3>
<p>agent workspace æ ¹ç›®å½•ï¼ˆå¦‚ <code>~/.openclaw/workspace-claw-admin/HEARTBEAT.md</code>ï¼‰</p>
<h3>ç¤ºä¾‹å†…å®¹</h3>
<pre><code class="language-markdown"># HEARTBEAT.md - claw-admin å¿ƒè·³ä»»åŠ¡

## å®šæœŸä»»åŠ¡
- [ ] æ£€æŸ¥ `docs/` ç›®å½•ä¸­çš„æ–°æ–‡ç« 
- [ ] å‘å¸ƒæ–°æ–‡ç« åˆ°çŸ¥è¯†åº“æœåŠ¡å™¨
- [ ] ç›‘æ§ OpenClaw é…ç½®å˜æ›´

## å½“å‰å¾…åŠ
- å‘å¸ƒæ–‡ç« ï¼š`docs/openclaw-memory-search-ollama-guide.md`
</code></pre>
<h3>å¿ƒè·³æç¤ºè¯</h3>
<p>é»˜è®¤æç¤ºè¯ï¼ˆä¸å¯ä¿®æ”¹ï¼‰ï¼š</p>
<pre><code>Read HEARTBEAT.md if it exists (workspace context).
Follow it strictly.
Do not infer or repeat old tasks from prior chats.
If nothing needs attention, reply HEARTBEAT_OK.
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>å®é™…æ¡ˆä¾‹</h2>
<h3>æ¡ˆä¾‹ 1: claw-admin é…ç½®</h3>
<p><strong>ä½ç½®</strong>: <code>~/.openclaw/workspace-claw-admin/</code></p>
<p><strong>é…ç½®</strong>:</p>
<pre><code class="language-json">{
  "id": "claw-admin",
  "workspace": "/Users/openmilo/clawall/claw-team/claw-admin",
  "heartbeat": {
    "every": "30m",
    "target": "none",
    "directPolicy": "allow"
  }
}
</code></pre>
<p><strong>HEARTBEAT.md</strong>:</p>
<pre><code class="language-markdown"># HEARTBEAT.md - claw-admin å¿ƒè·³ä»»åŠ¡

## å®šæœŸä»»åŠ¡
- [ ] æ£€æŸ¥ `docs/` ç›®å½•ä¸­çš„æ–°æ–‡ç« 
- [ ] å‘å¸ƒæ–°æ–‡ç« åˆ°çŸ¥è¯†åº“æœåŠ¡å™¨
- [ ] ç›‘æ§ OpenClaw é…ç½®å˜æ›´

## å½“å‰å¾…åŠ
- å‘å¸ƒæ–‡ç« ï¼š`docs/openclaw-memory-search-ollama-guide.md`
</code></pre>
<h3>æ¡ˆä¾‹ 2: xhs-admin é…ç½®</h3>
<p><strong>ä½ç½®</strong>: <code>~/.openclaw/workspace/xhs-admin/</code></p>
<p><strong>é…ç½®</strong>:</p>
<pre><code class="language-json">{
  "id": "xhs-admin",
  "heartbeat": {
    "every": "30m",
    "target": "none"
  }

<p><strong>ä»»åŠ¡</strong>: å°çº¢ä¹¦è´¦å·ç›‘æ§ã€ç¬”è®°å‘å¸ƒæ£€æŸ¥</p>
<hr>
<h2>Heartbeat vs Cron</h2>
<table>
<thead>
<tr>
<th>ç‰¹æ€§</th>
<th>Heartbeat</th>
<th>Cron</th>
</tr>
</thead>
<tbody>
<tr>
<td><strong>è§¦å‘æ–¹å¼</strong></td>
<td>å®šæœŸï¼ˆå¦‚æ¯ 30 åˆ†é’Ÿï¼‰</td>
<td>å®šæ—¶ï¼ˆå¦‚æ¯å¤© 9:00ï¼‰</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><strong>é€‚åˆåœºæ™¯</strong></td>
<td>åå°æ£€æŸ¥ã€ä¸»åŠ¨æ±‡æŠ¥</td>
<td>ç²¾ç¡®æ—¶é—´çš„ä»»åŠ¡</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><strong>é…ç½®ä½ç½®</strong></td>
<td><code>agents.defaults.heartbeat</code></td>
<td><code>cron.jobs[]</code></td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><strong>ä¼šè¯éš”ç¦»</strong></td>
<td>åœ¨ä¸»ä¼šè¯è¿è¡Œ</td>
<td>ç‹¬ç«‹ä¼šè¯</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><strong>æç¤ºè¯</strong></td>
<td>è¯»å– HEARTBEAT.md</td>
<td>åœ¨ cron job ä¸­å®šä¹‰</td>
</tr>
</tbody>
</table>
<p><strong>é€‰æ‹©å»ºè®®ï¼š</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>éœ€è¦<strong>å®šæœŸæ£€æŸ¥</strong> â†’ ç”¨ Heartbeat</li>
<li>éœ€è¦<strong>ç²¾ç¡®æ—¶é—´</strong> â†’ ç”¨ Cron</li>
<li>éœ€è¦<strong>ä¼šè¯éš”ç¦»</strong> â†’ ç”¨ Cron</li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>å¸¸è§é—®é¢˜</h2>
<h3>Q1: å¦‚ä½•ç¦ç”¨å¿ƒè·³ï¼Ÿ</h3>
<pre><code class="language-json5">{
  "agents": {
    "defaults": {
      "heartbeat": {
        "every": "0m"  // è®¾ä¸º 0m ç¦ç”¨
      }
    }
  }
}
</code></pre>
<h3>Q2: å¦‚ä½•è®©å¿ƒè·³å‘é€æ¶ˆæ¯ç»™æˆ‘ï¼Ÿ</h3>
<pre><code class="language-json5">{
  "heartbeat": {
    "every": "30m",
    "target": "last"  // å‘é€åˆ°æœ€åçš„è”ç³»äºº
  }
}
</code></pre>
<h3>Q3: å¦‚ä½•åªåœ¨ç™½å¤©è¿è¡Œå¿ƒè·³ï¼Ÿ</h3>
<pre><code class="language-json5">{
  "heartbeat": {
    "every": "30m",
    "activeHours": {
      "start": "09:00",
      "end": "22:00",
      "timezone": "Asia/Shanghai"
    }
  }
}
</code></pre>
<h3>Q4: å¿ƒè·³å›å¤ HEARTBEAT_OK åä¼šæ€æ ·ï¼Ÿ</h3>
<ul>
<li><code>HEARTBEAT_OK</code> ä¼šè¢«è‡ªåŠ¨è¯†åˆ«</li>
<li>å¦‚æœå›å¤åªæœ‰ <code>HEARTBEAT_OK</code> æˆ–å†…å®¹å¾ˆçŸ­ï¼ˆâ‰¤300 å­—ç¬¦ï¼‰ï¼Œæ¶ˆæ¯ä¼šè¢«ä¸¢å¼ƒ</li>
<li>ç”¨æˆ·ä¸ä¼šæ”¶åˆ°"ä¸€åˆ‡æ­£å¸¸"çš„æ±‡æŠ¥</li>
</ul>
<h3>Q5: å¦‚ä½•è‡ªå®šä¹‰å¿ƒè·³æç¤ºè¯ï¼Ÿ</h3>
<pre><code class="language-json5">{
  "heartbeat": {
    "every": "30m",
    "prompt": "æ£€æŸ¥ç³»ç»ŸçŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå¦‚æœæœ‰å¼‚å¸¸ç«‹å³æ±‡æŠ¥ã€‚"
  }
}
</code></pre>
<hr>
<h2>ç›¸å…³èµ„æº</h2>
<ul>
<li><strong>OpenClaw å®˜æ–¹æ–‡æ¡£</strong>: <a href="https://docs.openclaw.ai/gateway/heartbeat">https://docs.openclaw.ai/gateway/heartbeat</a></li>
<li><strong>Cron vs Heartbeat</strong>: <a href="https://docs.openclaw.ai/automation/cron-vs-heartbeat">https://docs.openclaw.ai/automation/cron-vs-heartbeat</a></li>
<li><strong>é…ç½®å‚è€ƒ</strong>: <a href="https://docs.openclaw.ai/gateway/configuration-reference">https://docs.openclaw.ai/gateway/configuration-reference</a></li>
</ul>
<hr>
<h2>æ€»ç»“</h2>
<p>Heartbeat æ˜¯ OpenClaw çš„<strong>ä¸»åŠ¨æ£€æŸ¥æœºåˆ¶</strong>ï¼š</p>
<ul>
<li>âœ… å®šæœŸè§¦å‘ï¼ˆé»˜è®¤ 30 åˆ†é’Ÿï¼‰</li>
<li>âœ… è¯»å– HEARTBEAT.md ä»»åŠ¡æ¸…å•</li>
<li>âœ… æœ‰äº‹æ±‡æŠ¥ï¼Œæ²¡äº‹æ²‰é»˜</li>
<li>âœ… é…ç½®ç®€å•ï¼Œæ•ˆæœæ˜¾è‘—</li>
</ul>
<p>é€šè¿‡åˆç†é…ç½® Heartbeatï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥è®© AI åŠ©æ‰‹æˆä¸ºçœŸæ­£çš„"ä¸»åŠ¨å‹"åŠ©æ‰‹ï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯è¢«åŠ¨ç­‰å¾…æŒ‡ä»¤ã€‚ğŸ¯</p>
